page.title: 10PRIDDY SCHOOL
page.content: At the centre of the village can be found the village school. Built next to the church, it is on raised ground with good views of the village and the surrounding countryside. Only 40 children attend the school and they are divided into 2 classes infants and juniors. There are 2 full time teachers and 1 part time. When it is time to go to secondary school most children go to the Blue School in Wells. There are many small schools like this one in Somerset and because Priddy is so far away from the nearest town it will stay open even though the number of children has been falling steadily over the last few years.
